Text: Over 50 seeders, and not one comment of any kind? Let me be the first to say thank you, Drarbg. And hopefully not the last.

OK, for a start, it downloaded VERY fast; I rate it V:10 A:10; it's in English; and while it includes subtitles, they are in Croatian only. The film itself looks excellent.  I repeat my thanks to Drarbg.
